template <template <typename > class Operation, typename Block, bool Elementwise = false>
class vsip_csl::Unary
File: ../../../vsip/core/expr/unary_block.hpp

Unary expression block type.

Template parameters:
Operation:Unary operation. Parametrized on value-type for elementwise operation, or on block otherwise.
Block:The argument block.
Elementwise:True if this is an elementwise operation.
Specializations:
